text:
Honestly I don't know, from what I heard with the last year's 2nd years they where incorporating  the fine arts students work into a real 2D environment using nuke but we've been told there going to be a live brief involved! I'll keep you updated on it.

That's great news! Are they based close to you? 
I've heard that working in smaller companies has a different feel when compared to working in a large company. Will you focusing on roto/comp still or you going in with learning a new role? Keep me updated on how you get on!
